description: Schema for the AWS Logs SubscriptionFilter resource.

DestinationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination.

FilterPattern.description: The filtering expressions that restrict what gets delivered to the destination AWS resource. For more information about the filter pattern syntax, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/logs/FilterAndPatternSyntax.html.

LogGroupName.description: The log group to associate with the subscription filter. All log events that are uploaded to this log group are filtered and delivered to the specified AWS resource if the filter pattern matches the log events.

RoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that grants CloudWatch Logs permissions to deliver ingested log events to the destination stream.
